brands.title: Samsung
models: Samsung Galaxy S24/ S24+/ S24 Ultra
Samsung Galaxy S22/ S22+/ S22 Ultra 5G
Samsung Galaxy S20/ S20+/ S20 Ultra 5G
exceptions: Samsung Galaxy A54 for Asia market are not eSIM compatible

Samsung S20/S21 and Galaxy Z Flip 5G from the USA are not eSIM compatible. (Samsung S21 series devices (not FE models) from the USA may have eSIM capability as long as the One UI 4 update is installed)
Samsung S20 FE Series are not eSIM capable
Samsung Note 20 Ultra and Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 2 from the USA and Hong Kong
Samsung Galaxy S20 Hybrid Dual SIM — Samsung produces both eSIM and no eSIM versions
Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra from Hong Kong

brands.title: Other
exceptions: Xiaomi 12T Pro/ 13T/ 13T Pro/ 14/ 14 Pro — eSIM availability may vary depending on country/region and carrier (https://www.mi.com/global/support/esim). For more details, please contact carrier for more information

Honor Magic 4 Pro, Honor Magic4 Ultimate, Honor Magic 5 Pro, Honor 90 — Only dual SIM model supports eSIM. SIM Card 2 can be set up as eSIM or Nano card. eSIM requires a wireless service plan and allows you to activate a mobile network plan without the use of a Nano SIM. eSIM availability may vary depending on country and carrier
only Europe version of Vivo X90 Pro and Vivo V29 Lite 5G support eSIMs
